name: Ars moriendi (adolfozt)
description:
Dying can be a painful and traumatic experience, but not this time!

Die as much as you can in this procedurally generated 2D platformer made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 2 to unlock new levels, escape the maze of temptations and achieve the true death.

Will you be able to master death?

Controls: Arrow keys + space bar
